website_summaries.verdict: Despite the low price, this massage gun includes a number of attachments and features 20 intensity settings.
pros: A simple, easy-to-use option with relatively quiet operation
Charges quickly and lasts for hours on a full battery, making it a great on-the-go option
Includes 6 massage heads and a carrying case
cons: Some customers reported blown fuses when charging this model

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS!
customer_reviews.text: After posting the review below the seller contacted me asking to delete and post a positive review and she would send me £50. Trust me, this product is terrible. Cheap and rubbish. Easy to tell ths is cheap made. Device did not charge and after once use began to decline in performance. Lasted about an hour before it broke. Awful chinese made product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous blown fuse use one
customer_reviews.text: Can the seller please contact me. On day of arrival I plugged this in and fuse blew in the AC unit, this is really dangerous and not fit for purpose. I would like to request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Poor product. It nearly set my house on fire when charging Please avoid!!!??
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, powerful and eases muscular pain.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that it is lightweight and powerful. Comes with more attachments than others on the market. Used for aching muscles after a hard days work and after football training. Downside is it doesn’t come with any info concerning what each attachment best is used for. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ceri J.

customer_reviews.title: Plug exploded whilst charging
customer_reviews.text: Only received item today, I plugged it in and the socket exploded.
customer_reviews.author: Perola Congo

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really works effectively on muscular pain. Product can be set from an intensity of 1 to 20, although 1 is often strong enough! Has several attachments to relieve different kinds of muscle knots. Battery lasts a good long time and recharges fully in a couple of hours. I've been sleeping better since I started using this. The seller is also very good. There was a problem with the unit that arrived (not the seller's fault) and the customer service I received was among the best I've experienced through Amazon. She immediately responded, and after verifying the problem with me, sent a replacement out straight away. So it's 5 stars for the product and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jewers

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different massagers but I find this one is different. Not only does it massage but it helps to relax and targets deep into the muscles. There are different adapters for different purposes and can be used all over the body. There are different levels of intensity and is suitable to target most areas of the body. What I like most about it is that is quiet when in use and the battery lasts long. It comes with a carrying case which is very convenient and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for deep tissue massage
customer_reviews.text: If you are working out a lot then this is a perfect product to help muscle recovery and making sure you don't pull muscles. Multiple speeds, and heads to it but the only thing it didn't come with is instructions on how to best use it on muscle groups or which head to use for what muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Pallett

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant .....this has been one of my better buys.....I suffer from back aches and muscle aches in the legs due to running...after using this for a few days legs and back a lot lot better....can be used anywhere as it comes in its own carry case.. it has 6 different attachments for different parts of body....from neck down to legs...on/off switch at bottom and easy control on side....started off on lower speed and worked my way up to higher speed....not very loud ....not heavy....attachments easily slid in/out...charges up quick and last a very long time....would recommend this product as it would help you to save money...... Fantastic
customer_reviews.author: 🔴 Dovile 43

customer_reviews.title: Great massage device
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my missus back ache and constant needing to massage her back, this unit helped fantastically, after a charge, I was able to use this over a hour non stop, with different modes and changeable heads depending on where u need to massage, it was ideal, there are quite a few on the market so I wasn't sure which one to get, this one works well for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: Has been used almost daily with great affect
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for use in training for the London marathon, whilst that is off the massager has been a pleasure to use. Lots of heads, lots of speed options (20) and the is an option for all aches all over the body. Could not be easier to use and the LCD display is a lovely extra. I'm using it almost daily and it does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: T boo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great for relieving knot in your lower back and hip. As I am 6 foot tall I’ve always had problems, and this helps relieve the pain. I went with this one because it was medium price compare to others out there. And it works great for me I recommend this to anyone who has back problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Decent multi speed unit for low cost
customer_reviews.text: Much more convenient than previous corded version I had. Battery lasts for hours without recharge. The swappable heads are good as other models just have the domes. My version has 20 speed settings which is good but it’s a stretch to call it ultra quiet. Anything past 10 and it rattles, angle using at also adds to the rattle noise. All in all great product for the money. Instruction booklet was pointless and didn’t describe the functions of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Coats

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a self massager but didn't want to pay £300 for the top name brand ones. I have nothing to compare to but in terms of value, this is excellent. The attachments are great, only really need 3 or 4 of them but it's nice to have the choice of 6. The battery life is fantastic, lasts a considerable amount of time (1 decent session only takes it down 10% if that) and the pressure is good. Overall, really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Mellish

customer_reviews.title: GreT purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase - bought on previous reviews - son in armed forces & used after physical exercise & so far a nice relief on aching muscles.
customer_reviews.author: John McAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Ralaxing muscles
customer_reviews.text: It's eally good for post workouts especially after long gym section work really well to just ease the muscles and relax them after an intense work out. 6 different heads is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Great for back and leg problems
customer_reviews.text: This bit of kit is so good I’m buying one for my parents and brother My husband has had the best night sleeps after using this on him. Helped sort out his back issues
customer_reviews.author: Ladyliz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, way cheaper than 'named brands', great service!
customer_reviews.text: Item works really well, massively cheaper than the high end brands and the customer service is faultless. I had a small issue with the charger, that was resolved within a working day and to a level which was far higher than the requested solution! Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really like it
customer_reviews.text: i am so surprise this massage gun ,easy use and relax my back ,it have difference head to change for difference muscle .i ask my flatmate to try it ,they are all like it and really want to have it ,recommend to choose this massage gun.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: God send for lower back
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant to target aches and pains, and to reduce recovery time after a workout. My only criticism is the battery life didn't seem to meet that which was described. Plenty to do a session just be mindful of charging in between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant so nice. Took the first usage to find right setting for me. Since I’ve been able to stop pain from trapped nerves to after workout soreness.
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant in buying this because it was the cheapest on the market. I needn't have worried, its excellent. It's easy to use and very powerful. It's so much better than other massage mats I've bought in the past. Doing your own back is a bit tricky though. Solid case great charging time and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted to buy one of these for a while now and have pull the triggered. It targets each different muscle groups with its different attachments specially designed for it. I love how powerful it carries in such a small component.
customer_reviews.author: Shahab Dad

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is brilliant. Eases tention in tight muscles, great after a long run or if you just have muscle pain. Varied selection of attachments. It's not as quiet as suggested but not bad. Feels well built for the price. Don't see why you would spend £200+ when you can get this.
customer_reviews.author: martin r.

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful
customer_reviews.text: Really not worth the money, not powerful. Soon as you hold it on the body the power slows down. I got one for 40pound from here before much better. I'll just use my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Muscle recovery upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Very great battery life. It works a treat. Lent it to a friend and everyone wanted to have a go with it on their back. I use it most evenings after a hard training session (running) to ease muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Akingbola

customer_reviews.title: Gutted.
customer_reviews.text: Hi Unsure why but this product has worked intermittently. Now doesn't charge or work even though it says it's fully charged and ready to go according to the instructions. Really disappointed as this was a birthday present and it's been used successfully twice out of countless attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Colven

customer_reviews.title: very effective
customer_reviews.text: Used this consistently on my back and hip. Very effective especially as there are changeable heads. Battery excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Thegardener

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this massage gun. fantastic product and great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous product, buy a brand you recognise instead
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Feels very cheap, massage parts are hard cheap plastic and you’re not able to use a lot of pressure on skin before it cuts out. Still awaiting seller reply as extremely unhappy. It’s definitely true what they say - buy cheap, buy twice.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun is so good, all my family uses it. For aches from work and niggles from training. So glad we have this in our life now. Saving time and money not using a physio so often 👍👍👍👍💕
customer_reviews.author: sheila Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Leaked oil all over me and my carpet. May have been unlucky with a faulty unit. Sent back for refund
customer_reviews.author: Miss E.

customer_reviews.title: Provides a great massage when body feels tired.
customer_reviews.text: I brought the YEEONE massage gun and it’s great! With 6 different massage heads this product can can range from providing a relaxing massage to a more deep intense massage for aching muscles. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gun as my first massage gun but it kept cutting out, was a bit disappointed because it worked well and was quite quiet
customer_reviews.author: Dalliman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow so impressed with this product, its amazing, very good options ref the power settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly, works brilliantly. Multiple attachments and I cannot see why I’d have wanted to spend 500 on more well known brands. Quiet operation and so far it hasn’t missed a beat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing - the range of speed and nozzles are great for all athletes. Especially want to say thanks to Jesse for providing excellent customer service. Would happily recommend. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Should be banned. Battery lasts for minutes on the lowest pressure settings. Sometimes doesn’t even turn on. Absolute waste of money. I’d like a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Although this product works it is poorly built and the battery indicator is just for show as I didn’t work in the slightest
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good for back pain and kinky sex
customer_reviews.text: The misses always gets knotted muscles in her back. A good go with this, and she's relaxed. Doubles up as a sex toy too. Lots of bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!
customer_reviews.text: Does not charge properly and is much louder than described, there are better ones on the market that are available.
customer_reviews.author: Philippa Mears

customer_reviews.title: Great massage gun
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Regular use of this massage gun gets rid of aches and pains!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Clear and understandable Instructions and warranty not included - English very poor on instructions
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it as there are no clear instructions on how to use on a damaged /injured muscle and intend to return it
customer_reviews.author: mair davies

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this brought mine in may doesn’t work anymore fake cheap rubbish
customer_reviews.author: Frank parfitt

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and easy to use. Well pleased. Case is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, same day delivery and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nicola Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bodybuilding
customer_reviews.text: As myself and my daughters father attend the gym regularly we also regularly have muscles aches and pains and using this massager has literally helped sooth those aching muscles. There are 20 settings of speed and I find even the 1st speed setting is so strong let alone level 20 however my daughters father likes 20 as his muscles are more accepting of the speed setting. With 6 different heads the options are endless and the stylish bag is great for carrying around and helpful to bring to the gym to loosen your muscles after a strenuous workout. Though the massager is big and sturdy its easy to use and works the knots out with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Shen

customer_reviews.title: Super Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun works very well and really has everything that can pinpoint muscle aches, soreness and tension. Its portable and comes with zippered carrying case with a handle, so taking it to the gym or the office is very convenient. The average battery life is 3 hours! One of the things you immediately notice about this massage gun is that it's powerful. Best one I have used yet, its easy on my muscles and helps relax them. Sorted my shoulders right out. Totally worth it though. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The best part of working out is using this bad boy after.
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun deserves every star it gets. My husband and I workout all the time. Recovery time is always important to us. This helps with it. It disperses the acids in our muscles so recovery time is a lot less. It helps take out rough knots in my neck and back. I love how you can change the level of massage pressure. It is easy to customize accordingly to the user.
customer_reviews.author: heyjude1205

customer_reviews.title: Do it all massage gun
customer_reviews.text: I think this massage gun is the best value there is. With all the different attachment heads and the ability to adjust different speeds, I can give the right type of pressure and impact in a massage to the bottom of my feet, to my arms, to my neck and back.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: It is my pain reliever for my sciatica.
customer_reviews.text: It is my pain reliever for my sciatica. It is good for blood circulation. It is easy to use and very handy.
customer_reviews.author: cj
